attributes.additional_details: Rail Track without consultation have closed the Guisborough forest cycle and walkway from Guisborough to Nunthorpe in Redcar & Cleveland. Redcar and Cleveland Council found an alternative route in using a cattle arch under the railway. Two out of three land owners agreed. We require the Department of Transport to compusary purchase the small strip of land to reopen this commuter route to work in Teesside from these towns which have no other footpath out of their communities of 40,000 people
